Asked if he admired George H.W. Bush - a Republican president he didn't serve under- Donald Rumsfeld was curt.
`` No. No,'' Donald Rumsfeld said. No, I was kind of disappointed in him.... He decided he wanted to leave people with the impression that he didn't want to go to the CIA[ in the Ford administration]. And that someone made him go there. I was there when she was surrounded by her friends in the Congress and Senate. And I think it was a combination, perhaps, of the unexpected and the familiar that really prompted her to open her eyes and look around, said her doctor, Dr. Michael Lemole. But it was Gabrielle Giffords ' husband's reaction to this milestone that made Kirsten Gillibrand realize this was the very first time Gabrielle Giffords had opened her eyes since being shot.
